Update : Our teams are still working on the correction. Updates will be posted as soon as significant progress is made.

Start time : 27/09/2022 15:30 UTC Service impact : For some customers, ordering Additionnal IPs via the API or the manager may not be possible. Root cause : A migration has impacted the SoYouStart and Kimsufi APIs. Ongoing actions : A fix is currently in progress. Workaround : You may contact the support team directly if you are impacted by this incident. They will be able to create Additional IPs orders for you.

Start time : 02/03/2023 21:00 UTC End time : 03/03/2023 01:00 UTC Service impact : No impact is expected for the customers who have set the aggregation properly (OLA configured). Otherwise, clients who have not defined the aggregation will have their servers temporarily unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a version upgrade on multiple network equipment.
